title: For face, for race, for grace ... [by] Hen: Farley; Simon Passæus sculpsit Lond.
author: Farley, Henry.
publisher: Are to be sould in Popes head Ally by Ioh. Sudbury and Georg Humble,
notes: Title from beginning of ten-line poem, by H. Farley, below engraved port. of Anne of Denmark, queen consort of James I of England.
Portrait frame contains inscription: Anna Dei gra[tia] magnæ Britann[iæ] Franciæ et Hyb[er]niæ regina, etc.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
